author: Kevin O'Sullivan
title: Coronavirus – the science: How physical distancing works and saves lives
description: Edition 3: Clinical trials plan to collect plasma recovered patients and inject into those fighting virus
content:
This is a series of regular updates from Irish Times Environment & Science Editor Kevin OSullivan on scientific initiatives and developments on coronavirus. Previous editions can be foundhere.
